exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description: A basic exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: A foundational lower-body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: An isometric core exercise that strengthens the abs, back, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: A lower-body exercise targeting the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.description: A classic cardio exercise that increases heart rate and burns calories.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that also strengthens the core, legs, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A strength exercise targeting the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: A core exercise that targets the obliques and abs.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunch
exercises.description: An effective ab exercise that targets the obliques and rectus abdominis.

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.description: A challenging upper-body exercise that works the back, shoulders, and arms.

exercises.name: Leg Raise
exercises.description: A core exercise that targets the lower abs.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise that improves power and explosiveness.

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the triceps and shoulders.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that also strengthens the legs and core.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: A core exercise that targets the obliques and stabilizing muscles.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: A lower-body exercise that targets the glutes and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Spider Crawl
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that increases strength, coordination, and mobility.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: A powerful exercise that works the entire body, focusing on the hips and glutes.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.description: A core stability exercise that strengthens the back, abs, and hips.

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the lower abs and improves core endurance.

exercises.name: Skater Jumps
exercises.description: A cardio and strength exercise that targets the legs and improves balance.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.description: A lower-body isometric exercise that targets the quads and glutes.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.description: An exercise that strengthens the lower back and glutes.

exercises.name: Step-up
exercises.description: A lower-body exercise that targets the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.
